text: Tortolì (Tortolì) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Nuoro in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 11,064 people lived there. Its area is 40.29 km².Istituto nazionale di statistica - Superficie territoriale per zona altimetrica It is 13 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of Nuoro
title: Tortolì
